scripts.deploy: git push heroku `git subtree split --prefix node_server heroku US60-SwaggerAPIFrontEnd`:master

comments.generalInformation: Turning on line wrapping in your IDE for this file would be very helpful for sanity haha. See this link: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/settings#_language-specific-editor-settings. Also this comments portion is NOT built in to npm. It is just a space to add comments because JSON doesn't allow you to do that.

scripts.deploy: Deploys the node_server folder only to the heroku repo, the heroku repo needs to be setup locally first though for this to work. This should only be run locally and not on a server remotely. Also a different branch can be pushed besides master by changing the last part "master" to "branch-name:master"
